properties.name: Atlanta, GA
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepAtlanta, GAVisited a friend who lived here briefly. Ate some great food!

properties.name: Clark University
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheep950 main st. worcester, ma 01610Where I went to get my BA

properties.name: Durango, CO
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepOne of the places I was during my CO trek.

properties.name: Flagstaff, AZ
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheepflagstaff azFabulous vaca here. Many great places to eat and stuff to do. Actually had the best Thai food here!

properties.name: Grand Canyon
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepGrand CanyonNothing like taking a trip to the Grand Canyon from the back of a Harley motorcycle!

properties.name: Grand Mayan,  Acapulco, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepAcapulco, MexicoStayed at a resort for a week during our honeymoon.

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheep

properties.name: Iceland
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepWith only plane tickets in hand, I set off for a two week solo adventure. No place to stay, no one I knew. It was the best vacation I ever had!

properties.name: Kansas City, MO
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepKansas City, MOWent to a conference here. Actually, a beautiful city and decent BBQ (but not as good as "RedBones" in Boston).

properties.name: Las Vegas, NV
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepLas Vegas, NVWent to a "national council on problem gambling" conference here. Had a good time, surprisingly. One of the casinos had an old "Galaga" video game (my fav).

properties.name: Mesa Verde
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepMesa Verde National Park, ColoradoOne of the places I went during my CO trek

properties.name: Monttreal, Canada
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepMontreal, CanadaMany a fun times here!

properties.name: Old Forge
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepHere\'s where I started my solo kayak trip (about 100 miles long). The route follows the original “highways of the Adirondacks” the interconnecting lakes and rivers that stretch from Old Forge to Saranac Lake.

properties.name: Ottawa, Canada
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepAfter the crazy canoe trip in Algonquin Park, spent a fun night in this city.

properties.name: Ouray, CO
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepSpend some time here during my CO trek.

properties.name: Owen Sound, Canada
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepSpent many childhood vacations here visiting relatives

properties.name: Pompano Beach, FL
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheep  Visited my grandparents here a bunch as a kid.

properties.name: Raleigh, NC
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepMarcom St, Raleigh, NCVisited my uncle\'s place here.

properties.name: RedBones
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheep55 Chester St, Somerville, MABest BBQ ever! Their Hushpuppies and "The Barbeque Belt" can\'t be beat!

properties.name: San Antonio, TX
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepSan Antonio, TXFlew out to San Antonio, TX to help a friend move. We packed up a huge moving truck, complete with towed car, and drove all the way back to Albany, NY.

properties.name: San Juan, Puerto Rico
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheepsan juanLong weekend visiting boyfriend\'s relatives and going to a wedding.

properties.name: Telluride, CO.
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepOne of the places I went during my CO trek

properties.name: Tempe, AZ
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepTempe, ArizonaWas here during a conference. Had a blast!

properties.name: Toronto, Canada
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheeptorontoSpent many childhood vacations here visiting relatives.

properties.name: Triple D's
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheep435 S. Huntington Ave., Jamaica Plain, MAOne of my old hangouts. A place where we could play gin rummy and not get thrown out for gambling. My best friend ended up marrying the bartender! (Happened to be the owner\'s son).

properties.name: Troncones, Mexico.
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepSpent several days/nights in this small town (population about 500) during our honeymoon. Had the "hotel" all to ourselves (not even the owner or staff was there!).

properties.name: Washington DC
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepWashington DCVisited friends around here a bunch of times.

properties.name: Zihuatanejo, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepStayed in this fishing village for a while during our honeymoon.

properties.name: carbondale, co.
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepOne of the places I went during my CO trek.

properties.name: colorado springs, co
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepColorado SPrings, COOne of the places I was during my CO trek.

properties.name: jamaica plain, ma
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepAfter college, I lived in Boston. Specifically, the "JP" area. Great location!

properties.name: red rock canyon, nv
properties.description: Posted by Blacksheepred rocks, nvWent to a "national council on problem gambling" conference in Vegas and spent the afternoon here. Beautiful and no neon!

properties.name: saranac lake, ny
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepHere\'s where I ended my solo kayak trip (about 100 miles long). The route follows the original “highways of the Adirondacks” the interconnecting lakes and rivers that stretch from Old Forge to Saranac Lake.

properties.name: silverton, co
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepOne of the places I went during my CO trek.

properties.name: speculator, ny
properties.description: Posted by BlacksheepSpent many nights here. A "home-base" to a lot of cross country skiing excursions.
